name: Showers
description: MNRC offers people experiencing homelessness access to showers free of charge. How to Apply: - Drop-in during open hours (first come first serve) Open Hours: - Monday through Wednesday: 7AM to 7PM - Thursday: 7AM to 5PM - Friday: 7AM to 7PM - Saturday: 7AM to 12PM Service Contact information: - Email: info@mnhc.org
